results.idea: Momentum scaled by volatility
results.description: Combine short-term returns with volatility to favor high-return low-volatility stocks. Applied SUGGESTION1 by using two datafields (rsk62_5_return, rsk62_risk_volatility). SUGGESTION2 not applicable (no vector fields). SUGGESTION3 not needed since both coverages=1.0. SUGGESTION4 satisfied: both fields have high userCount/alphaCount. Confidence set to 0.80 because momentum/volatility scaling is well-documented and uses high-quality fields.

results.idea: Mean-reversion: 1-day return reversal
results.description: Short-term reversal using yesterday's returns. SUGGESTION1: used rsk62_1_return and rsk62_volatility_di. SUGGESTION2 N/A. SUGGESTION3 N/A. SUGGESTION4: rsk62_1_return has very high userCount. Confidence 0.75 due to robust empirical evidence but higher turnover risk.

results.idea: Idiosyncratic risk focus: low specific risk long
results.description: Prefer stocks with low specific (ksrs) scaled by past returns. SUGGESTION1 used rsk62_5_return and rsk62_5_100_ksrs. SUGGESTION2 N/A. SUGGESTION3 not needed (coverage high). SUGGESTION4 used ksrs which has high userCount. Confidence 0.72 because idiosyncratic risk premium is plausible.

results.idea: Liquidity-adjusted momentum
results.description: Momentum divided by log(adv20) to penalize illiquid winners. SUGGESTION1 used rsk62_5_return and rsk62_beta_5_100_logadv20. SUGGESTION3 N/A (coverage=1). SUGGESTION4 logadv20 has high userCount. Confidence 0.78 as liquidity scaling often improves momentum.

results.idea: Industry-relative momentum
results.description: Rank stock return relative to its industry return to remove industry moves. SUGGESTION1 used rsk62_5_return and rsk62_industry_1_100_val100 (industry series). SUGGESTION4 industry field userCount high. No vector ops. Confidence 0.70 because industry-neutral momentum reduces common factor risk.

results.idea: Beta-neutral momentum (divide by industry beta)
results.description: Scale momentum by industry beta to prefer stocks outperforming after adjusting for industry sensitivity. SUGGESTION1: rsk62_5_return and rsk62_beta_5_100_banks (example industry beta). SUGGESTION3 applied if coverage<0.6; this field coverage 0.5504 so ts_backfill used. SUGGESTION4 beta has good userCount. Confidence 0.68 because industry beta backfill adds noise but conceptually sound.

results.idea: Momentum IR: ts_ir of returns
results.description: Use information ratio of returns (mean/std) for robustness. SUGGESTION1 uses rsk62_5_return only (single field) — SUGGESTION1 partially applied; single field accepted. SUGGESTION2 N/A. SUGGESTION4 rsk62_5_return high userCount. Confidence 0.76 since IR is a stable ranking.

results.idea: Decay-weighted momentum
results.description: Apply linear decay to past returns to emphasize recent moves. SUGGESTION1 used rsk62_retseries_factor_5_100_val1 (factor series) and rsk62_5_return. SUGGESTION2: retseries is timeseries, but not a per-day vector field so vec ops not used. SUGGESTION3 not required. Confidence 0.66 because decay weighting often helps but requires parameter tuning.

results.idea: Cross-sectional zscore of earnings (EPS) growth
results.description: Rank stocks by beta to growth (rsk62_beta_1_100_growth) zscore to capture growth exposure. SUGGESTION1 used rsk62_beta_1_100_growth and rsk62_risk_growth (backfill available). SUGGESTION3: risk_backfill_growth exists; used to ensure coverage. SUGGESTION4 growth fields have high userCount. Confidence 0.65 given mixed empirical support.

results.idea: Low PB anomaly: inverse book-to-price
results.description: Long high book-to-price (low PB) scaled by momentum. SUGGESTION1 used rsk62_beta_factor_1_100_pb and rsk62_5_return. SUGGESTION4 pb fields have high userCount. Confidence 0.71 as value effect persistent.

results.idea: Short-term momentum zrank
results.description: Cross-sectional rank of 1-week returns (ts_rank) to pick winners. SUGGESTION1 single datafield rsk62_1_return used (SUGGESTION1 partially applied). SUGGESTION4 rsk62_1_return high userCount. Confidence 0.74 because short-term momentum is effective.

results.idea: Volatility breakout: returns times volatility change
results.description: Multiply returns by recent change in volatility to capture breakout with rising volatility. SUGGESTION1 used rsk62_5_return and rsk62_risk_volatility. SUGGESTION3 N/A. Confidence 0.60 because noisier signal.

results.idea: Earnings momentum (EPS momentum)
results.description: Use net income per employee momentum (rsk62_nipe_di) with price momentum. SUGGESTION1: rsk62_nipe_di and rsk62_5_return. SUGGESTION4 nipe_di has high userCount. Confidence 0.67 as fundamental momentum is supportive albeit slower.

results.idea: Industry beta dispersion
results.description: Prefer stocks with low industry-constrained beta dispersion: subtract industry beta from stock beta. SUGGESTION1 uses rsk62_beta_1_100_logcap and rsk62_beta_industry_constr_1_100_computers (example). SUGGESTION3 applied since industry_constr coverage 0.4388 <0.6, use ts_backfill. SUGGESTION4 beta fields have high userCount. Confidence 0.62 due to backfilled noise.

results.idea: Size-adjusted reversal
results.description: Short-term reversal adjusted for log(cap). SUGGESTION1: rsk62_1_return and rsk62_risk_logcap. SUGGESTION4 both have good userCounts. Confidence 0.69 because size adjustment improves reversals.

results.idea: Momentum minus industry intercept
results.description: Subtract industry intercept to get stock-specific momentum. SUGGESTION1 used rsk62_5_return and rsk62_5_100_intercept. SUGGESTION4 intercept has very high userCount. Confidence 0.70 since intercept removal reduces common noise.

results.idea: Trend persistence via ts_arg_max
results.description: Pick stocks where recent return is the maximum over lookback (persistent trend). SUGGESTION1 used rsk62_5_return only. SUGGESTION4 field has high userCount. Confidence 0.63—usable but sensitive to lookback.

results.idea: Factor timing using factor return series correlation
results.description: Long stocks with positive correlation to a strong-performing factor. SUGGESTION1 uses rsk62_5_return and rsk62_retseries_factor_5_100_val1. SUGGESTION2: retseries is vector across days, but ts_corr handles timeseries — vec ops not used. SUGGESTION4 retseries has decent userCount. Confidence 0.64 since factor timing is conditional.

results.idea: Momentum scaled by dividend strength
results.description: Favor momentum in firms with strong dividend signals. SUGGESTION1 used rsk62_5_return and rsk62_dividend_di. SUGGESTION4 dividend_di userCount high. Confidence 0.66 as dividends signal quality.

results.idea: Short-term mean-reversion weighted by turnover target (hump)
results.description: Reduce turnover using hump while applying reversal. SUGGESTION1 used rsk62_1_return only. SUGGESTION2 N/A. SUGGESTION4 high userCount. Confidence 0.58 because turnover control reduces edge but is practical.

results.idea: Momentum signal winsorized
results.description: Winsorize 20-day momentum to reduce outliers. SUGGESTION1 used rsk62_5_return only. SUGGESTION4 high userCount. Confidence 0.65 since winsorizing stabilizes signal.

results.idea: Momentum residual after regressing out market intercept
results.description: Remove intercept to get idiosyncratic momentum. SUGGESTION1 used rsk62_5_return and rsk62_5_100_intercept. SUGGESTION4 intercept high userCount. Confidence 0.68 as residuals often enrich alpha.

results.idea: Relative volatility breakout
results.description: Use ratio of short-term to long-term volatility as breakout signal. SUGGESTION1 uses rsk62_risk_mts (short-term momentum proxy) and rsk62_risk_mtl (long-term momentum) but primary fields are volatility: rsk62_risk_volatility. Used ts_std_dev with different windows. SUGGESTION4 vol has high userCount. Confidence 0.61 due to mixed evidence.

results.idea: Momentum filtered by current ratio (financial health)
results.description: Favor momentum in companies with healthy current ratios. SUGGESTION1 used rsk62_5_return and rsk62_risk_curratio. SUGGESTION4 curratio userCount high. Confidence 0.66 as combining quality with momentum helps.

results.idea: Short-term return zscore multiplied by book-to-price beta
results.description: Amplify reversals where PB beta suggests value. SUGGESTION1: rsk62_1_return and rsk62_beta_factor_1_100_pb. SUGGESTION4 pb beta userCount moderate. Confidence 0.6 as mixed effect.

results.idea: Momentum times net income per employee (quality-weighted)
results.description: Combine price momentum with nipe to prefer profitable-per-employee momentum. SUGGESTION1 used rsk62_5_return and rsk62_nipe_di. SUGGESTION4 nipe_di userCount high. Confidence 0.68 as quality-weighted momentum performs well historically.

results.idea: Factor exposure reversion: decrease exposure to factor spikes
results.description: Short stocks with rapid increase in factor exposure (beta to growth). SUGGESTION1 used rsk62_beta_1_100_growth and ts_delta. SUGGESTION3 N/A. SUGGESTION4 beta_growth userCount high. Confidence 0.59 because beta shifts can be noisy.

results.idea: Low volatility anomaly via inverse volatility
results.description: Prefer stocks with low risk_volatility by taking inverse and zscore. SUGGESTION1 single field rsk62_risk_volatility. SUGGESTION4 high userCount. Confidence 0.73; low-vol often outperforms on risk-adjusted basis.

results.idea: Momentum combined with specific earnings surprise proxy (rsk62_risk_backfill_spe)
results.description: Use backfilled EPS field to avoid missing data (SUGGESTION3). SUGGESTION1 used rsk62_5_return and rsk62_risk_backfill_spe. SUGGESTION3 applied: used backfill field. Confidence 0.66 since earnings signals help momentum.

results.idea: Momentum weighted by adv20 logcap interaction
results.description: Use product of momentum and log(cap) to prefer large-liquid momentum. SUGGESTION1: rsk62_5_return and rsk62_beta_5_100_logcap. SUGGESTION4 logcap userCount good. Confidence 0.62 as size effects can tilt returns.

results.idea: Trend strength via ts_kurtosis of returns
results.description: High kurtosis in return series may signal likely continuation or reversal; use as filter. SUGGESTION1 used rsk62_retseries_factor_5_100_val1. SUGGESTION2: retseries is vector-like so consider vec_avg? Not necessary because ts_kurtosis exists. SUGGESTION4 retseries userCount moderate. Confidence 0.54—exploratory.

results.idea: Momentum minus industry mean (group neutral)
results.description: Cross-sectional momentum neutralized to group (industry) mean. SUGGESTION1 used rsk62_5_return and group_neutralize. SUGGESTION4 rsk62_5_return high userCount. Confidence 0.69 as group neutralization reduces sector bets.

results.idea: Return acceleration: ts_delta of ts_mean
results.description: Capture accelerating momentum via delta of moving averages. SUGGESTION1: rsk62_5_return only. SUGGESTION4 high userCount. Confidence 0.63 since acceleration sometimes predictive.

results.idea: Long-short by PB bucket extremes
results.description: Bucket stocks into PB quantiles and long low PB short high PB. SUGGESTION1 used rsk62_beta_factor_1_100_pb. SUGGESTION4 pb userCount good. Confidence 0.70 as classic value strategy.

results.idea: Momentum filtered by high net income per employee growth
results.description: Multiply momentum by recent growth in nipe (quality momentum). SUGGESTION1 used rsk62_5_return and rsk62_risk_nipe. SUGGESTION3 backfill risk_backfill_nipe exists but coverage already high. SUGGESTION4 both have high userCounts. Confidence 0.68.

results.idea: Short-term mean reversion for high-vol stocks
results.description: Apply reversal only to high volatility names to exploit overshoot. SUGGESTION1 used rsk62_1_return and rsk62_risk_volatility. SUGGESTION4 vol has high userCount. Confidence 0.64 given conditional performance.

results.idea: Momentum cross-sectional zscore after winsorize
results.description: Winsorize 60-day returns then zscore to reduce outliers. SUGGESTION1 rsk62_5_return only. SUGGESTION4 high userCount. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Volatility adjusted mean-reversion using ts_scale
results.description: Scale recent returns by min/max over period to normalize cross-section. SUGGESTION1 rsk62_5_return. SUGGESTION4 high userCount. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Momentum tilt toward low-debt firms (qe2d)
results.description: Favor momentum in low debt-to-equity (rsk62_risk_qe2d). SUGGESTION1 used rsk62_5_return and rsk62_risk_qe2d. SUGGESTION4 curratio/qe2d fields have high userCount. Confidence 0.65.

results.idea: Momentum plus low volatility (combine zscores)
results.description: Add zscore of momentum and inverse volatility to form composite. SUGGESTION1 uses rsk62_5_return and rsk62_risk_volatility. SUGGESTION4 both high userCount. Confidence 0.74 as simple blending improves stability.

results.idea: Momentum adjusted by long-term momentum beta
results.description: Divide short-term momentum by long-term momentum beta to prefer stocks with strong short-term but controlled long-term exposure. SUGGESTION1 used rsk62_5_return and rsk62_beta_5_100_mtl. SUGGESTION4 mtl has high userCount. Confidence 0.60.

results.idea: Industry return surprise: recent industry return vs 60-day mean
results.description: Capture industries accelerating relative to history; long stocks within industries trending upward. SUGGESTION1 used rsk62_industry_1_100_val100 and rsk62_5_return. SUGGESTION4 industry field high userCount. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: Momentum times low beta to market
results.description: Favor momentum among low market-beta stocks (defensive winners). SUGGESTION1 used rsk62_5_return and rsk62_beta_1_100_volatility (proxy). SUGGESTION4 beta_1_100_volatility userCount high. Confidence 0.67.

results.idea: Cross-sectional rank of growth-beta times returns
results.description: Multiply growth beta by recent returns and rank cross-sectionally. SUGGESTION1 used rsk62_beta_1_100_growth and rsk62_5_return. SUGGESTION4 growth beta high userCount. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Momentum with backfill for low-coverage industry betas
results.description: Use ts_backfill for industry-constrained beta fields with coverage <0.6 (SUGGESTION3). SUGGESTION1 used rsk62_5_return and rsk62_beta_industry_constr_5_100_computers (coverage~0.4137) with ts_backfill. Confidence 0.55 given interpolation risk.

results.idea: Momentum filtered by recent factor return (factor timing)
results.description: Only trade momentum when a chosen factor is positive over recent period. SUGGESTION1 used rsk62_5_return and rsk62_factor_5_100_val1 (factor). SUGGESTION4 factor field userCount moderate. Confidence 0.60.

results.idea: Momentum Z minus industry Z
results.description: Subtract industry zscore from stock zscore to get idiosyncratic zscore. SUGGESTION1 rsk62_5_return and rsk62_industry_1_100_val100. SUGGESTION4 high userCounts. Confidence 0.68.

results.idea: Momentum weighted by intercept (stock alpha proxy)
results.description: Use intercept as proxy for baseline expected return and weight momentum accordingly. SUGGESTION1 rsk62_5_return and rsk62_1_100_intercept (high userCount). Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Relative strength across factors using ts_corr
results.description: Compute correlation of stock returns with different factor return series and pick stocks most correlated with winning factors. SUGGESTION1 uses rsk62_5_return and rsk62_retseries_factor_1_100_val1. SUGGESTION2 N/A. Confidence 0.59 exploratory.

results.idea: Momentum conditioned on high intercept environment
results.description: Only go long momentum when intercept is above its historical mean (macro favorable). SUGGESTION1 rsk62_5_return and rsk62_5_100_intercept. SUGGESTION4 intercept userCount high. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: Momentum adjusted for idiosyncratic risk (ksrs inverse)
results.description: Reduce weight for high specific risk names using rsk62_5_100_ksrs inverse. SUGGESTION1 used rsk62_5_return and ksrs. SUGGESTION4 ksrs high userCount. Confidence 0.69.

results.idea: Short-term momentum as quantile with gaussian mapping
results.description: Map 5-day returns to Gaussian quantiles to stabilize cross-section. SUGGESTION1 used rsk62_5_return. SUGGESTION4 high userCount. Confidence 0.65.

results.idea: Momentum crossover: fast vs slow avg difference
results.description: Signal = fast MA minus slow MA of returns. SUGGESTION1 rsk62_5_return only. Confidence 0.64 as standard crossover technique.

results.idea: Momentum weighted by dividend backfill
results.description: Use backfilled dividend strength to avoid missing data (rsk62_risk_backfill_dividend). SUGGESTION3 applied. SUGGESTION1 uses rsk62_5_return. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: Momentum scaled by inverse industry beta
results.description: Reward stocks that outperform relative to low industry beta. SUGGESTION1 uses rsk62_5_return and rsk62_beta_industry_constr_5_100_reits (coverage~0.602 — >0.6 so ts_backfill not required). SUGGESTION4 moderate userCount. Confidence 0.61.

results.idea: Momentum with winsorized pb
results.description: Combine momentum with winsorized PB to limit extremes. SUGGESTION1 uses rsk62_5_return and rsk62_beta_factor_1_100_pb. SUGGESTION4 pb userCount good. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Momentum IR adjusted for industry volatility
results.description: Use information ratio of returns divided by industry volatility. SUGGESTION1 rsk62_5_return and rsk62_volatility_di. SUGGESTION4 vol_di high userCount. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Momentum filtered by positive long-term momentum
results.description: Only trade short-term momentum if long-term momentum is also positive. SUGGESTION1 rsk62_5_return and rsk62_id_mtl (id of long-term momentum). SUGGESTION4 id_mtl userCount good. Confidence 0.61.

results.idea: Cross-sectional zscore of logcap-weighted returns
results.description: Scale returns by log(cap) to favor large-liquid winners. SUGGESTION1 rsk62_5_return and rsk62_risk_logcap. SUGGESTION4 logcap userCount moderate. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: Momentum based on vec_avg of factor retseries
results.description: For a vector factor series, average intraday or multi-factor returns (SUGGESTION2). Used rsk62_retseries_factor_5_100_val1 (vector-like) with vec_avg and combined with rsk62_5_return. SUGGESTION4 retseries userCount moderate. Confidence 0.57 exploratory.

results.idea: Momentum with ts_std_dev momentum filter
results.description: Use stocks with high return but low return volatility (ts_std_dev). SUGGESTION1 rsk62_5_return and ts_std_dev on same. SUGGESTION4 high userCount. Confidence 0.69.

results.idea: Momentum signal dampened by hump to control turnover
results.description: Apply hump to momentum to reduce position churn. SUGGESTION1 rsk62_5_return only. SUGGESTION4 high userCount. Confidence 0.6 practical tradeoff.

results.idea: Momentum vs industry dispersion
results.description: Long stocks whose momentum exceeds industry mean by a quantile threshold. SUGGESTION1 rsk62_5_return and rsk62_industry_1_100_val100. SUGGESTION4 industry field strong. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Momentum filtered by ts_count_nans (data quality)
results.description: Exclude stocks with many NaNs in recent history to improve reliability. SUGGESTION1 rsk62_5_return and ts_count_nans. SUGGESTION4 5_return high userCount. Confidence 0.55 due to conservative filter.

results.idea: Momentum signal normalized by ts_scale
results.description: Scale momentum temporally to get stable values. SUGGESTION1 rsk62_5_return. SUGGESTION4 high userCount. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Momentum combined with low debt-to-equity (beta q e2d)
results.description: Prefer momentum in low-debt firms. SUGGESTION1 rsk62_5_return and rsk62_beta_1_100_qe2d. SUGGESTION4 qe2d userCount strong. Confidence 0.64.

results.idea: Momentum with group mean haircut (group_mean)
results.description: Shrink momentum toward group mean to avoid extreme idiosyncratic bets. SUGGESTION1 rsk62_5_return and group_mean operator. Applied group_mean to reduce outliers. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Momentum enhanced by positive factor IR
results.description: Multiply stock momentum by factor's information ratio to time when factor is reliable. SUGGESTION1 rsk62_5_return and rsk62_retseries_factor_1_100_val1. SUGGESTION2 N/A. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Momentum vs 1-year returns spread
results.description: Short-term vs long-term return spread to capture mean-reverting trends. SUGGESTION1 rsk62_5_return only. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Momentum on factor-adjusted returns (subtract factor return)
results.description: Subtract factor return series to get stock alpha-like momentum. SUGGESTION1 rsk62_5_return and rsk62_retseries_factor_5_100_val1. SUGGESTION4 moderate. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: Momentum with ts_regression residual
results.description: Use residual from regression of returns on a factor over lookback. SUGGESTION1 rsk62_5_return and rsk62_retseries_factor_1_100_val1. SUGGESTION4 available. Confidence 0.65.

results.idea: Momentum tilting to industries with recent positive intercepts
results.description: Favor stocks in industries whose intercepts have recently risen. SUGGESTION1 rsk62_5_return and rsk62_industry_5_100_intercept. SUGGESTION4 industry intercept userCount moderate. Confidence 0.56.

results.idea: Mean-reversion using ts_arg_min (recent extreme lows)
results.description: Long stocks currently at the 60-day low (arg_min=0 means current min). SUGGESTION1 rsk62_5_return only. SUGGESTION4 high userCount. Confidence 0.61.

results.idea: Momentum combination with beta to logadv20 (liquidity)
results.description: Penalize momentum by illiquidity using logadv20 beta. SUGGESTION1 rsk62_5_return and rsk62_beta_factor_5_100_logadv20. SUGGESTION4 beta logadv20 userCount high. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Momentum with ts_product (accumulated returns)
results.description: Use product of 5-day returns to capture compounding momentum. SUGGESTION1 rsk62_5_return only. SUGGESTION4 high userCount. Confidence 0.57 due to noise amplification.

results.idea: Momentum cross-sectional zscore after group_scale
results.description: Within-group normalize momentum to remove group-level spread differences. SUGGESTION1 rsk62_5_return and group_scale used (KEEP_IN_MIND4: group used as parameter). Confidence 0.64.

results.idea: Momentum with volatility-target turnover (ts_target_tvr_hump)
results.description: Tune hump to target turnover while trading momentum. SUGGESTION1 rsk62_5_return only. SUGGESTION4 high userCount. Confidence 0.55 practical.

results.idea: Momentum combined with inverse specific risk and winsorize
results.description: Combine momentum with inverse ksrs and winsorize to reduce outliers. SUGGESTION1 rsk62_5_return and rsk62_5_100_ksrs. SUGGESTION4 ksrs userCount high. Confidence 0.7.

results.idea: Momentum sign times inverse volatility
results.description: Take direction of short-term return but size by inverse volatility to favor stable directional bets. SUGGESTION1 rsk62_5_return and rsk62_risk_volatility. Confidence 0.68.

results.idea: Momentum based on ts_rank across multiple windows (ensemble)
results.description: Average ranks of momentum over 5,20,60 days to form ensemble. SUGGESTION1 uses rsk62_5_return only. SUGGESTION4 high userCount. Confidence 0.67.

results.idea: Momentum combined with dividend and pb filters
results.description: Only take momentum in stocks with positive dividend signal and favorable PB. SUGGESTION1 rsk62_5_return, rsk62_dividend_di and rsk62_beta_factor_1_100_pb. SUGGESTION4 all fields have decent userCounts. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Momentum scaled by net income per employee (backfilled)
results.description: Use backfilled nipe to avoid missing values (SUGGESTION3). SUGGESTION1 rsk62_5_return and rsk62_risk_backfill_nipe used. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Momentum conditional on factor ts_quantile
results.description: Only trade when a factor's ts_quantile indicates extreme (e.g., >0.9). SUGGESTION1 used rsk62_5_return and rsk62_factor_5_100_val1. SUGGESTION4 factor has moderate userCount. Confidence 0.56.

results.idea: Momentum times inverse beta to banks (risk-managed)
results.description: Use inverse industry beta to reduce sector exposure. SUGGESTION1 rsk62_5_return and rsk62_beta_1_100_banks. SUGGESTION3 N/A coverage ~0.5834. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Momentum signal from retseries vec_sum
results.description: For vector retseries field, sum elements for intraday/factor aggregation (SUGGESTION2). Used rsk62_retseries_factor_5_100_val1 with vec_sum and combined with rsk62_5_return. SUGGESTION4 retseries userCount moderate. Confidence 0.53 exploratory.

results.idea: Momentum filtered by low group_count (concentrated groups)
results.description: Avoid trading in groups with low valid coverage to improve liquidity. SUGGESTION1 rsk62_5_return only and group_count operator used as group diagnostic. SUGGESTION4 high userCount. Confidence 0.52 conservative.

results.idea: Momentum times inverse growth beta
results.description: Penalize momentum by growth beta to prefer value-yielding momentum. SUGGESTION1 rsk62_5_return and rsk62_beta_1_100_growth. SUGGESTION4 growth beta high userCount. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Momentum with ts_zscore normalization
results.description: Normalize moving-average returns with ts_zscore to remove regime shifts. SUGGESTION1 rsk62_5_return. SUGGESTION4 high userCount. Confidence 0.65.

results.idea: Momentum minus factor exposure (group neutralization)
results.description: Neutralize momentum with group_neutralize to remove factor-driven parts. SUGGESTION1 rsk62_5_return and group_neutralize used. Confidence 0.67.

results.idea: Momentum weighted by recent factor ts_rank
results.description: Use factor's ts_rank to weight momentum — higher when factor ranks high. SUGGESTION1 rsk62_5_return and rsk62_factor_5_100_val1. SUGGESTION4 moderate. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: Momentum with sign and winsorize
results.description: Use only direction of momentum and winsorize magnitude to reduce tail risk. SUGGESTION1 rsk62_5_return only. SUGGESTION4 high userCount. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Momentum with sector intercept subtraction (industry_constr intercept)
results.description: Remove industry-constrained intercept to focus on residual momentum. SUGGESTION1 rsk62_5_return and rsk62_industry_constr_5_100_intercept. SUGGESTION4 industry intercept userCount moderate. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Momentum enhanced by low beta to volatility
results.description: Prefer momentum among low volatility-beta names. SUGGESTION1 rsk62_5_return and rsk62_beta_1_100_volatility. SUGGESTION4 beta userCount good. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Short-term mean-reversion filtered by high specific risk
results.description: Apply reversal only for names with high ksrs (overshoots). SUGGESTION1 rsk62_1_return and rsk62_5_100_ksrs. SUGGESTION4 ksrs high userCount. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Momentum using combined factor returns (add few factors)
results.description: Add signals from multiple factor return series to create diversified factor momentum. SUGGESTION1 uses rsk62_retseries_factor_5_100_val1 and rsk62_retseries_factor_1_100_val1 (two datafields). SUGGESTION2 not needed. SUGGESTION4 fields moderate. Confidence 0.55 exploratory.

results.idea: Momentum trimmed by ts_count_nans across factor series
results.description: Exclude factor signals with many NaNs (data quality) before using momentum. SUGGESTION1 rsk62_retseries_factor_5_100_val1 and ts_count_nans. SUGGESTION3 N/A as coverage good. Confidence 0.52 conservative.

results.idea: Momentum combined with inverse industry-specific beta
results.description: Adjust momentum using inverse of industry-specific expected returns (beta_5_100 semiconductors etc). SUGGESTION1 uses rsk62_5_return and rsk62_beta_5_100_semiconductors (coverage ~0.5372). SUGGESTION3 not required. Confidence 0.56.

results.idea: Momentum with ts_zscore of factor momentum
results.description: Multiply stock momentum by zscore of factor momentum (ts_zscore of factor returns). SUGGESTION1 uses rsk62_5_return and rsk62_retseries_factor_5_100_val1. SUGGESTION4 moderate. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: Momentum filtered by moving kurtosis (stable vs explosive)
results.description: Prefer momentum when return kurtosis below threshold to avoid explosive regime. SUGGESTION1 rsk62_retseries_factor_5_100_val1 for kurtosis measure. SUGGESTION4 moderate. Confidence 0.51 experimental.

results.idea: Momentum weighted by inverse industry volatility
results.description: Scale stock momentum by inverse of its industry's volatility to avoid noisy sector moves. SUGGESTION1 rsk62_5_return and rsk62_volatility_di (industry). SUGGESTION4 vol_di high userCount. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: Momentum combined with PB and dividend backfilled filters
results.description: Use backfilled dividend and pb to ensure data completeness and quality (SUGGESTION3). SUGGESTION1 rsk62_5_return, rsk62_risk_backfill_dividend, rsk62_risk_backfill_pb. SUGGESTION4 backfill fields have high userCounts. Confidence 0.64.

results.idea: Momentum amplified by recent industry return acceleration
results.description: Multiply stock momentum by industry's recent acceleration. SUGGESTION1 rsk62_5_return and rsk62_retseries_industry_5_100_val1. SUGGESTION4 industry retseries userCount decent. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Momentum with ts_arg_max to favor recent peaks
results.description: Select stocks whose most recent return is the max over lookback (momentum confirmation). SUGGESTION1 rsk62_5_return only. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Momentum with winsorized inverse logcap
results.description: Penalize small caps via inverse logcap winsorized to avoid extremes. SUGGESTION1 rsk62_5_return and rsk62_risk_logcap. SUGGESTION4 logcap userCount strong. Confidence 0.61.

results.idea: Momentum using signed_power to emphasize strong winners
results.description: Apply signed_power to momentum to amplify signals while preserving sign. SUGGESTION1 rsk62_5_return only. SUGGESTION4 high userCount. Confidence 0.58 experimental.

results.idea: Momentum cross-sectional normalize then scale to booksize
results.description: Normalize momentum cross-sectionally and scale to booksize to form weights. SUGGESTION1 rsk62_5_return and scale operator used. SUGGESTION4 high userCount. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: Momentum conditional on factor volatility low
results.description: Only trade momentum when factor volatility is low (reduces regime risk). SUGGESTION1 rsk62_5_return and ts_std_dev on rsk62_retseries_factor_5_100_val1. SUGGESTION4 moderate. Confidence 0.55 conservative.

results.idea: Momentum combined with ts_regression slope (trend strength)
results.description: Use slope from regression of returns on time to assess trend strength and weight momentum. SUGGESTION1 rsk62_5_return and ts_regression. SUGGESTION4 high userCount. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Momentum penalized by recent ts_count_nans in factor fields
results.description: Avoid momentum when factor data coverage is poor (data quality filter). SUGGESTION1 rsk62_5_return and rsk62_retseries_factor_5_100_val1 with ts_count_nans. Confidence 0.52 conservative.

results.idea: Momentum with ts_delay to avoid look-ahead (practical)
results.description: Use delayed returns for robustness and to respect execution lag. SUGGESTION1 rsk62_5_return only. Confidence 0.6 practical.
